changeSet.id: JB-1906 - Specific NGES reports should be removed from core or other clients databases
changeSet.author: Leandro Zoi
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM entity_report_map erm USING entity e, report r WHERE erm.entity_id = e.id AND erm.report_id = r.id AND (e.type IS NULL OR e.type NOT IN ('ESCO', 'LDC')) AND r.name IN ('billing_register_summary', 'billing_register_detail', 'purchase_of_receivables');

changeSet.author: Leandro Zoi

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM preference_type WHERE id = 85

changeSet.comment: This preference will allow to include ageing chronologically

column.name: content
column.value: Enabling this option overrides the default sequential logic for Collections. An account in Collections will change its status based on the overdue time of the oldest unpaid invoice and not how long the account has been in Collections.
